mapper.select: SELECT RECNUM, RECRUIT.COMID, COMNAME, RECTITLE FROM RECRUIT INNER JOIN BUSINESS_MEMBERS ON RECRUIT.COMID = BUSINESS_MEMBERS.COMID

SELECT PERSONAL_RESUME.RESNUM, PERSONAL_RESUME.RESTITLE, PERSONAL_RESUME.USERID FROM PERSONAL_RESUME JOIN APPLIED_RESUME ON PERSONAL_RESUME.RESNUM = APPLIED_RESUME.RESNUM JOIN RECRUIT ON APPLIED_RESUME.RECNUM = RECRUIT.RECNUM WHERE RECRUIT.COMID = #{ comid }
